alert.note: Alert for Grande Ronde Valley (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 17 at 12:48AM PST until January 17 at 3:00PM PST by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON FOR THE SOUTHERN GRANDE RONDE VALLEY... * WHAT...South to southeast winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts of 40 to 55 mph. * WHERE...Southern Grande Ronde Valley. * WHEN...Until 3 PM PST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Winds could cause blowing and drifting snow. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Advertised winds will primarily affect the southern Grande Ronde Valley as well as Ladd and Pyles canyons. Winds will be lighter elsewhere.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
